oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The making of Clay Pots. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-23. 8054-8067). Fragments of Pottery. (L VIII.-27. 8436 and 8437). |han=kass'o describes and identifies a broken clay pot. He believes it has been used to boil meat. 1) pp.8435v & 8436v: see Details about various people known by |han=kass'o, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-27.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The old clay pot
